TABLE.CAPTION: Edit Table View
TABLE.SUBHEADING: Select the default data you would like displayed in the {{ tableName }} view
TABLE.FOOTER_TEXT: The order and selection will be saved automatically. Press "{{resetTranslation}}" to restore the default view.

CONFIRMATIONS.CONTINUE_ACTION: Are you sure you want to continue?

NOTICE.UNKNOWN: The following element will be deleted
NOTICE.EVENT: The following event will be deleted
NOTICE.SERIES: The following series will be deleted

NOTICE.LOCATION: The following location will be deleted

WARNINGS.SERIES_HAS_EVENTS: This series does contain events. Deleting the series will not delete the events.

ERRORS.SERIES_HAS_EVENTS: This series cannot be deleted as it still contains events.

NOTIFICATIONS.ACL_ADDED: The access policy has been created
NOTIFICATIONS.ACL_NOT_SAVED: The access policy could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.ACL_UPDATED: The access policy has been updated
NOTIFICATIONS.ACL_DELETED: The access policy has been deleted
NOTIFICATIONS.ACL_NOT_DELETED: The access policy could not be deleted
NOTIFICATIONS.USER_NOT_SAVED: The user could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.USER_NOT_DELETED: The user could not be deleted
NOTIFICATIONS.GROUP_CONFLICT: The generated group name already exists
NOTIFICATIONS.GROUP_NOT_SAVED: The group could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.GROUP_NOT_DELETED: The group could not be deleted
NOTIFICATIONS.ACCESS_DENIED: Access denied. You're not allowed to view this page
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_NOT_SAVED: The series could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENTS_NOT_CREATED: The event could not be created
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENTS_UPDATED_NB: {{ number }} events have been successfully updated
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENTS_UPDATED_ALL: All events have been successfully updated
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENTS_NOT_UPDATED: The event could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENTS_NOT_UPDATED_ID: The event {{ id }} could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENTS_NOT_UPDATED_ALL: None of the events could be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_UPDATED_NB: {{ number }} series have been successfully updated
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_UPDATED_ALL: All series have been successfully updated
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_NOT_UPDATED: The series could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_NOT_UPDATED_ID: The series {{ id }} could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_NOT_UPDATED_ALL: None of the series could be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENTS_NOT_DELETED: The event(s) could not be deleted
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENTS_NOT_DELETED_NOT_AUTHORIZED: The event could not be deleted, because you don't have the permission to do so.
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_NOT_DELETED: The series could not be deleted
NOTIFICATIONS.LOCATION_NOT_DELETED: The location could not be deleted
NOTIFICATIONS.LOCATION_NOT_DELETED_NOT_AUTHORIZED: The location could not be deleted, because you don't have the permission to do so.
NOTIFICATIONS.CONFLICT_DETECTED: Scheduling conflict: this new event overlaps with an existing event. Please change the location, dates or times.
NOTIFICATIONS.CONFLICT_BULK_DETECTED: Scheduling conflict: changing the events results in conflicts. Please change the location, dates or times.
NOTIFICATIONS.CONFLICT_ALREADY_ENDED: Scheduling error: The event has already ended.
NOTIFICATIONS.CONFLICT_END_BEFORE_START: Scheduling error: Schedule end has to be later than the start.
NOTIFICATIONS.CONFLICT_IN_THE_PAST: The schedule could not be updated: You cannot schedule an event to be in the past.
NOTIFICATIONS.INVALID_ACL_RULES: Rules have to contain a valid role and read or/and write right(s).
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSING_ACL_RULES: At least one role with Read and Write permissions is required!
NOTIFICATIONS.SAVED_ACL_RULES: The access rules have been saved.
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_THEME_REPROCESS_EXISTING_EVENTS: The existing events in this series will need to be reprocessed
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_ACL_LOCKED: Editing Access Policies is not allowed when operations are running on an event that is part of the series
NOTIFICATIONS.SERIES_ACL_MISSING_READWRITE_ROLE: The Access Policy requires at least one role with Read and Write permissions.
NOTIFICATIONS.EVENT_ACL_MISSING_READWRITE_ROLE: The Access Policy requires at least one role with Read and Write permissions.
NOTIFICATIONS.THEME_NAME_ALREADY_TAKEN: This name is already in use
NOTIFICATIONS.THEME_NOT_CREATED: The theme could not be created
NOTIFICATIONS.THEME_NOT_DELETED: The theme could not be deleted
NOTIFICATIONS.TASK_NOT_CREATED: The task could not be created
NOTIFICATIONS.VIDEO_CUT_NOT_SAVED: The editing information could not be saved
NOTIFICATIONS.VIDEO_CUT_SAVED: The editing information has been saved
NOTIFICATIONS.VIDEO_SOURCE_TRACKS_INVALID: You have selected no video tracks to process
NOTIFICATIONS.VIDEO_TOO_MANY_AUDIOS: You cannot have more than one audio stream on a single video stream
NOTIFICATIONS.SERVER_UNRESPONSIVE: Oops! The server seems to be unresponsive. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATIONS.SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Oops! The server seems to be unresponsive. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATIONS.ACTIVE_TRANSACTION: This event can not be edited while there is an active workflow or transaction.

BULK_ACTIONS.CAPTION: Actions

SERIES.CAPTION: Delete
SERIES.CANNOT_DELETE: The highlighted series cannot be deleted as they still contain events.

EVENTS.CAPTION: Delete

PUBLISHED.NONE: None of the selected events need to be retracted before they can be deleted.
PUBLISHED.WARNING: The events below cannot be deleted as they have already been published and deleting them would leave no way to delete the published files. Instead choose a workflow below to retract the events first and then delete them.

EVENTS.UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to delete the highlighted events. Please unselect them to continue.

UNPUBLISHED.NONE: None of the selected events can be deleted without leaving orphan files.

BULK_ACTIONS.DELETE_EVENTS_WARNING_LINE1: Once deleted, all event metadata, audio and video files will be deleted and be unrecoverable.
BULK_ACTIONS.DELETE_SERIES_WARNING_LINE1: Once deleted, all series metadata will be unrecoverable. Events in the series will not be deleted.

GENERAL.CAPTION: General
GENERAL.CANNOTSTART: Highlighted event(s) cannot be processed at the moment. Deselect it/them or try again later.

GENERAL.CAPTION: General
GENERAL.CANNOTSTART: Highlighted event(s) cannot be processed, only scheduled events are supported.
GENERAL.NOCHANGES: No changes to the events detected!
GENERAL.CANNOTEDITSCHEDULE: For the highlighted events, you don't have the permission to edit scheduling information. You can continue, but you won't be able to edit scheduling information of any events at all.

EDIT.CAPTION: Edit
EDIT.HEADER: This page allows you to edit scheduled events grouped by weekdays. The inputs fields are pre-filled in case all scheduled events have the same value for a specific field. Otherwise, the input fields are left blank. Leaving input fields blank means that the respective values should not be changed.

RETRACT.CAPTION: Retract Event
RETRACT.WARNING: This event has been published to at least one publication channel so it has to be retracted before it can be deleted. Select from the tasks below to retract the publications.

SOURCE.CAPTION: Source

SEGMENTABLE.DETAIL: The file contains a recording of a slide presentation (Keynote, Powerpoint, etc).

NON_SEGMENTABLE.DETAIL: The file contains a recording of a person speaking to an audience.

MULTIPLE_PARTS.DETAIL: A set of files containing different parts of the event.

SOURCE.NO_SOURCE_AVAILABLE: No capture agents available for scheduling

UPLOAD_ASSET.CAPTION: Asset Upload
UPLOAD_ASSET.NO_OPTIONS: A list of asset options was not provided to this section of the web page!

TOOLTIP.EDITOR_NEEDS_CUTTING: Open video Editor (a comment indicates that cutting the video has been requested)

PUBLICATIONS.CAPTION: Publications
PUBLICATIONS.NO_PUBLICATIONS_AVAILABLE: This event has not been published
PUBLICATIONS.PUBLICATION_DESCRIPTION: This event has been published to the following publication channels:
PUBLICATIONS.LIVE_EVENT_NOT_IN_PROGRESS: This event is not currently in progress

SEGMENTABLE.DETAIL: The file contains a recording of a slide presentation (Keynote, Powerpoint, etc).

NON_SEGMENTABLE.DETAIL: The file contains a recording of a person speaking to an audience.

LOCKED.RUNNING: Editing metadata is not allowed when operations are running on an event

WORKFLOWS.TITLE: Title
WORKFLOWS.NO_CONFIGURATION: No existing configuration parameters for the selected workflow definition.

TOOLTIP.ABORT: Abort execution of workflow  (don't retry failed operation again)

ACCESS_POLICY.TITLE: Access policy
ACCESS_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: At least one role with Read and Write permissions is required.
ACCESS_POLICY.LABEL: Select a template

DESCRIPTION.TEXT: You can optionally use themes to brand your videos. Themes may define bumper and trailer videos, watermarks and title slides including metadata.

ACCESS_POLICY.TITLE: Access policy
ACCESS_POLICY.LABEL: Select a template
ACCESS_POLICY.REPLACE_EVENT_ACLS_HINT: Ensure all events of this series have these permissions in effect

DESCRIPTION.ROLES: Roles and groups that can be or are already assigned to the user.
DESCRIPTION.EXTERNALROLES: The list of external roles assigned to the user granted by the external role provider(s).
DESCRIPTION.EFFECTIVEROLES: The list of effective roles directly assigned to the user and the roles indirectly loaded through group membership.

ACCESS_POLICY.TITLE: Access policy
ACCESS_POLICY.LABEL: Select a template
ACCESS_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Please choose a pre-configured set of policies or add custom policies below

ACCESS_POLICY.TITLE: Access policy
ACCESS_POLICY.LABEL: Select a template
ACCESS_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Please choose a pre-configured set of policies or add custom policies below

GENERAL.CAPTION: General
GENERAL.NAME: Name
GENERAL.SET_DEFAULT_INFO: Set as default theme for all series and events

BUMPER.CAPTION: Bumper (begin)
BUMPER.DESCRIPTION: Predefined video that is appended to the beginning of a recording.

TRAILER.CAPTION: Bumper (end)
TRAILER.DESCRIPTION: Predefined video that is appended to the end of a recording.

TITLE.CAPTION: Title
TITLE.DESCRIPTION: Predefined slide including descriptive metadata appended to the beginning or end of a recording.

WATERMARK.CAPTION: Watermark
WATERMARK.DESCRIPTION: Semi-transparent image that is overlaid on every frame of the recording.

GENERAL.CAPTION: General
GENERAL.NAME: Name
GENERAL.SET_DEFAULT_INFO: Set as default theme for all series and events

BUMPER.CAPTION: Bumper (begin)
BUMPER.DESCRIPTION: Predefined video that is appended to the beginning of a recording.

TRAILER.CAPTION: Bumper (end)
TRAILER.DESCRIPTION: Predefined video that is appended to the end of a recording.

TITLE.CAPTION: Title
TITLE.DESCRIPTION: Predefined slide including descriptive metadata appended to the beginning or end of a recording.

WATERMARK.CAPTION: Watermark
WATERMARK.DESCRIPTION: Semi-transparent image that is overlaid on every frame of the recording.
WATERMARK.FILEUPLOAD_DESCRIPTION: File should have an alpha channel (transparent background). Acceptable file types are: .PNG, .GIF, .SVG, .WEBP

USAGE.CAPTION: Usage
USAGE.EMPTY: No series found for current theme

TOOLTIP.SANITIZE: Sanitize service (set service back to state normal)

VIDEO_TOOL.WARNING_UNSAVED: Warning: Some of your changes were not saved. If you leave the video editor, these changes will get lost. Do you really want to continue?

THUMBNAIL.DESCRIPTION: A default thumbnail used to visually represent the event is generated automatically. In case you want to use a different thumbnail, you can extract a thumbnail from the video at the current playback position or upload an image.

FROM_VIDEO.LABEL: Extract from video
FROM_VIDEO.TOOLTIP: Extract the thumbnail from the video at the current playback position

FROM_LEFT_VIDEO.LABEL: Extract from left video
FROM_LEFT_VIDEO.TOOLTIP: Extract the thumbnail from the left video at the current playback position

FROM_RIGHT_VIDEO.LABEL: Extract from right video
FROM_RIGHT_VIDEO.TOOLTIP: Extract the thumbnail from the right video at the current playback position

USE_DEFAULT.LABEL: Use default thumbnail
USE_DEFAULT.TOOLTIP: Use the default thumbnail that is generated automatically

PREVIEW.OUTDATED: The preview is outdated since segments were changed. It will be updated as soon as you save your changes.

CURRENT.DEFAULT: You are currently using the default thumbnail.
CURRENT.SNAPSHOT: The current thumbnail has been extracted from the video.
CURRENT.UPLOAD: You are currently using an uploaded thumbnail.

TRACKS.DESCRIPTION: You can unselect tracks to exclude them from further processing. Please note that you need to (re-)publish the event to actually apply the changes.

NOTIFICATION.NO_VIDEO_TRACK_SELECTED: You must enable at least one video track
NOTIFICATION.NO_AUDIO_TRACK_SELECTED: You must enable at least one audio track

TOOLTIPS.HIDE: This video track is currently enabled. Click to disable
TOOLTIPS.UNHIDE: This video track is currently disabled. Click to enable.

TOOLTIPS.HIDE: This audio track is currently enabled. Click to disable
TOOLTIPS.UNHIDE: This audio track is currently disabled. Click to enable

CHEAT_SHEET.TITLE: Keyboard shortcuts
CHEAT_SHEET.HINT: This page lists the currently available keyboard shortcuts. Note that these might change depending on what page you are currently visiting.

MULTI.PLACEHOLDER: To insert multiple values press Enter in between

STATISTICS.NOT_AVAILABLE: Statistics cannot be displayed at the moment. Please try again later.
STATISTICS.UNSUPPORTED_TYPE: Sorry, Opencast cannot render this type of statistical data.

DESCRIPTION.RANDOM: This displays random data as a showcase. You can disable this chart by deleting the corresponding statistics provider's json definition from etc/providers
DESCRIPTION.VIEWS_SUM: This displays the total number of views per time uinit.
DESCRIPTION.VIEWS_AVG: This displays the mean number of daily views per time uinit.
